extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Product Deals & Reviews! This application website is dedicated to post up special deals, discounts, promotional codes, coupons, offers, and hot sales that are currently available online or in retail stores right to your fingertips. We will be posted a wide range of selection of incredible deals ranging from laptops and HDTV's to restaurant coupons, video games and much more. We like to pick and choose what we think our consumers will be able to take advantage of and save a bundle of money, as well as giving our consumers a brief review of a certain product that we had tried and to provide our feed backs on it. And of course, we greatly encourage our readers to provide their feed backs on our site as well so that we can all share our experiences and help each other to make a good and informed decision at what we are buying! We would like to thank you in advance for your participation!
